SUPPORT.TITLE: Support
SUPPORT.NO_ACCESS_DESC: Photo permission denied. You can enable it in settings.

INFO_ANALYTICS.TITLE: About Analytics
INFO_ANALYTICS.HOW_IT_WORKS_CONTENT: In this section you can view your statistics for the day, month and year. The calendar shows the days when lessons were completed. You can tap on days to view detailed information.
INFO_ANALYTICS.HOW_TO_READ_DATA_CONTENT:
- SERIES: Number of consecutive days without skipping.
- ACCURACY: Percentage of correct answers.
- TIME: Minutes spent learning.
- XP: Earned experience points.
- ERRORS: Number of mistakes made.
INFO_ANALYTICS.WHY_TRACK_STATS_CONTENT: Regular progress helps in retaining material better. Keep track of your streak and don't skip days!

AVATAR_CHANGE.AVATAR_UPDATE_FAILED: Failed to update avatar. Please try again.

STREAK.TITLE: Day {{day}} of your streak
STREAK.SUBTITLE: starts tomorrow!
STREAK.TIP: Tip: Your streak will reset if you don't practice tomorrow. Watch out!

FIRST_LESSON.TITLE: First Lesson
FIRST_LESSON.DESCRIPTION: You have to complete your first lesson!

INFO_STREAK.TITLE: The winning streak shows how many days you've been practicing without a break
INFO_STREAK.SUBTITLE: To continue your streak, you can:
INFO_STREAK.HINT: For any of these actions, you also earn experience points and can compete for the top spot in the league.

WEEKLY_RANKING.TITLE: Weekly Ranking
WEEKLY_RANKING.DESCRIPTION: Every Sunday at 00:00, the WeeklyXP points for all users are reset, starting a new week ranking.

MONTHLY_RANKING.TITLE: Monthly Ranking
MONTHLY_RANKING.DESCRIPTION: On the first day of each month, the MonthlyXP points for all users are reset, starting a new monthly ranking.

WHY_RESET.TITLE: Why Reset?
WHY_RESET.DESCRIPTION: We provide equal conditions for competition – this helps maintain interest and motivation. Weekly and monthly resets make the race for points fair and exciting.

LOGIN_FORM.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters long
LOGIN_FORM.PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
LOGIN_FORM.PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
LOGIN_FORM.PASSWORD_DIGIT: Password must contain at least one digit
LOGIN_FORM.PASSWORD_SPECIAL: Password must contain at least one special character (@$!%*?&)

SIGNUP.TITLE: Let's Get Started
SIGNUP.SUBTITLE: Create your account below
SIGNUP.SUCCESS_TEXT: You have successfully created your account.

SIGNUP_FORM.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters long
SIGNUP_FORM.PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
SIGNUP_FORM.PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
SIGNUP_FORM.PASSWORD_DIGIT: Password must contain at least one digit
SIGNUP_FORM.PASSWORD_SPECIAL: Password must contain at least one special character (@$!%*?&)

DATA.DESCRIPTION_1: Start your journey to learn the Kazakh language with ease and fun.
DATA.DESCRIPTION_2: Engage with interactive lessons and quizzes to boost your Kazakh skills.
DATA.DESCRIPTION_3: Track your progress and become fluent in Kazakh, one step at a time.

CLOSE_BOTTOMSHEET.TITLE: Wait, don’t go!
CLOSE_BOTTOMSHEET.SUBTITLE: You'll lose your progress if you quit now.
